description: {"blocks":[{"key":"eavfj","text":"This protocol describes steps for targeting metabolites with [U-13C]glucose in mice for metabolomics analysis.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f8b67","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cl1de","text":"Surgical tools – scissors, tweezers, forceps, spatula, razor","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"960ld","text":"Heating pad (K\u0026H Thermo-Peep Heated Pad)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jk41","text":"Tail illuminator (Braintree Scientific: MTI STD)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hkef","text":"Glue (Loctite 1699233)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eum6b","text":"30g needles (BD: 305106)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at2m4","text":"PE tubing (BD: PE#10)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36gt2","text":"Syringe pump (WPI: SP220I)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1sj25","text":"1mL syringes (BD: 309628)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9pdi1","text":"Vapor splitter (VetEquip: CX-IM 5 place manifold)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1j38v","text":"Dry ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dn9t6","text":"Sterile 1X PBS or saline","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cktp6","text":"[U-13C]glucose solutions (Cambridge Isotope Laboratories: CLM-1396-1)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbifl","text":"Glucometer (Zoetis: AlphaTrak 2)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1v7rs","text":"Luer adapter","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1476q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3cj85","text":"Day of Procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92hnb","text":"Protocol adapted from UCLA Metabolomics Center.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":22,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbiqi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c67m2","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6amqa","text":"Aluminum foil","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ltqj","text":"Metal Pad","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1oird","text":"Dry ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2qhf5","text":"Hammer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14upn","text":"Microcentrifuge tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7pfs2","text":"80% methanol","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4h4jq","text":"Vortex mixer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"iafs","text":"Ice","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3tirt","text":"Centrifuge","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5o8po","text":"Screw-cap glass vials","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5i1op","text":"Day Prior to Procedure","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fit1","text":"Weigh mice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"alkep","text":"Fast mice overnight (14-16 hours).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b5674","text":"Make [U-13C]glucose solutions with PBS/saline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1iuf4","text":"Bolus: 200 µL of 0.4 mg/g.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4qkns","text":"Infusion: 75 µL of 0.72 mg/g.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"calp1","text":"Anesthetize mice in an induction chamber with 2% isoflurane with flowrate set to 1.2 L/min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f867d","text":"Move a mouse to the tail illuminator, cannulate the tail vein and glue needle in place.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1s9ps","text":"Test that the catheter works by infusing 0.1 mL of saline – the saline should flow up the tail vein if it was cannulated correctly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3ov90","text":"Gently move mouse and catheter to the isoflurane-splitter.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ssqf","text":"Repeat steps 3-4 to fill up the remaining spaces on the isoflurane-splitter (up to 5 mice).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c8reh","text":"Prick the paw of each mouse with a needle (18G) to measure the pre-infusion blood glucose level.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7og55","text":"Inject the bolus glucose solution into each mouse and transfer the luer adapter to the infusion syringes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9l37i","text":"Start infusion at a flow rate of 150 µL/h for 75 µL (30 min).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5bc5p","text":"After infusion is done, euthanize mice by cervical dislocation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7m9mk","text":"Quickly dissect out the brain and flash freeze in isopentane cooled to -80C or liquid nitrogen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a734h","text":"Store samples in -80°C until further processing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ol0t","text":"Wrap frozen brains in pre-cooled aluminum foil and place on a metal pad on ground dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b578d","text":"Pulverize tissue with a hammer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5rsfj","text":"Transfer the ground tissue into a pre-cooled microcentrifuge tube on dry ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"28dcn","text":"Add 1mL 80% MeOH at -80°C and vortex vigorously for 30 s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4feqp","text":"Incubate samples at -80°C for an hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1v4er","text":"Allow samples to warm up a bit on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"pa4","text":"Vortex samples again for 30 s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8m6au","text":"Centrifuge at top speed (16,000 g) for 15 min at 4°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8vf4g","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a screw-cap glass vial and store at -80°C until shipping to UCLA Metabolomics Core.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qeku","text":"Protocol from UCLA Metabolomics Center.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":14,"length":25}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a2hg6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fbvk","text":"Materials","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7htd8","text":"Q Exactive mass spectrometer (Thermo Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2udfn","text":"Vanquish Flex UHPLC (Thermo Scientific)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bln38","text":"Ion Chromatography System ICS-5000+","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ddksh","text":"Luna NH2 3um 100A (150 × 2.0 mm) column (Phenomenex) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1phbj","text":"LC-MS grade acetonitrile (ACN)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qfbc","text":"LC-MS grade water","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71npp","text":"5 M ammonium acetate","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f5qt9","text":"ammonium hydroxide","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"su72","text":"Dilute the MeOH extract with 50% ACN to 50 mg tissue/ml concentration (1:5-1:10).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bdtad","text":"Spin 10 min at full speed at 4C to clarify the samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"c31nk","text":"Transfer the supernatant to glass vials with glass insert.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6co20","text":"Combine 10 ul of each sample to make a pool sample used to condition the column prior loading the individual samples.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7nuhq","text":"Place samples in autosampler 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4775a","text":"Load 5 ul onto a Luna NH2 column using a Vanquish Flex.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v34c","text":"Separate the metabolites at a flow rate of 200 μl/min with mobile phases A (5 mM NH4AcO pH 9.9) and B (100% ACN) using a linear gradient from 15% A to 95% A over 18 min followed by a 7 min isocratic wash at 95% A.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e3645","text":"Re-equilibrate the column to 15% A for 15 min prior to loading the next sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fd6hh","text":"Acquire data with a Q Exactive mass spectrometer using polarity switching in full scan mode using a range of 70-975 m/z and 70.000 resolution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"njrg","text":"Convert the RAW files to mzXML format using the msConverter (part of open source ProteoWizard).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"554b9","text":"Extract metabolite intensities with Maven (v 8.1.27.11) using a targeted list of polar metabolites of central carbon metabolism with expected retention time and accurate mass measurements (\u003c 5 ppm) for identification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bgcin","text":"Perform data analysis using R scripts functions (or other tools). Correct isotopologue data for the natural abundance of C13 using AccuCor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: In Vivo Metabolomics
